ygData.subject: Level 35 song
ygData.msgSnippet: Was it a PC shaman duel or a NPC shaman combat?  I thought the general consensus was that NPC casters had unlimited mana and therefore the 35 mana drain song
ygData.messageBody:
Was it a PC shaman duel or a NPC shaman combat? I thought the general
consensus was that NPC casters had unlimited mana and therefore the 35 mana
drain song was useless against them.

Galtin of E'ci

> > How about this: Has anyone EVER successfully use the level 35 song? Is
> > there a point to it? It seems to drain mana so slowly that it is
> useless.
>
> I took out a shaman the other day with it.
>
> Stun, drain, stun, drain, stun, drain.
>
> After about 1-2 minutes she had no mana. Needless to say,
> caster with no mana = dead caster.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
